`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-cpp",children:`#include <iostream>\r
#include <vector>\r
using namespace std;\r
\r
int N, K, W, V;\r
vector<vector<int> > dp;\r
// dp[\uAC2F\uC218][\uBB34\uAC8C]\r
// dp[N][K]\r
\r
int main()\r
{\r
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\r
	cin.tie(0);\r
	cout.tie(0);\r
\r
	cin >> N >> K;\r
	dp.resize(N + 1, vector<int>(K + 1, 0));\r
\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
	{\r
		cin >> W >> V;\r
\r
		for (int j = 1; j <= K; j++)\r
		{\r
			dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\r
			if (W <= j)\r
				dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - W] + V);\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	cout << dp[N][K];\r
\r
	return 0;\r
}
`})})]})}function N(i={}){let{wrapper:n}=i.components||{};return n?(0,e.jsx)(n,Object.assign({},i,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s,i)})):s(i)}var b=N;function v(i,n,r){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+i+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it."+(r?"\nIt\u2019s referenced in your code at `"+r+"` in `C:\\Users\\\uAC15\uB2E4\uD61C\\Desktop\\code\\psst54-blog-ts\\files\\post\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-6fea10f7-7efc-4e9c-941d-dc5580fa73a1.mdx`":""))}return x(K);})();

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-cpp",children:`#include <iostream>\r
#include <vector>\r
using namespace std;\r
\r
int N, M, m[101], c;\r
vector<vector<int> > dp;\r
\r
int main()\r
{\r
	ios::sync_with_stdio(false);\r
	cin.tie(0);\r
	cout.tie(0);\r
\r
	cin >> N >> M;\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
		cin >> m[i];\r
	dp.resize(N + 1, vector<int>(10001, 0));\r
\r
	for (int i = 1; i <= N; i++)\r
	{\r
		cin >> c;\r
\r
		for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
		{\r
			dp[i][j] = dp[i - 1][j];\r
			if (j >= c)\r
				dp[i][j] = max(dp[i][j], dp[i - 1][j - c] + m[i]);\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	for (int j = 0; j <= 10000; j++)\r
	{\r
		if (dp[N][j] >= M)\r
		{\r
			cout << j;\r
			return 0;\r
		}\r
	}\r
\r
	return 0;\r
}
`})})]})}function M(i={}){let{wrapper:n}=i.components||{};return n?(0,e.jsx)(n,Object.assign({},i,{children:(0,e.jsx)(s,i)})):s(i)}var g=M;function $(i,n,r){throw new Error("Expected "+(n?"component":"object")+" `"+i+"` to be defined: you likely forgot to import, pass, or provide it."+(r?"\nIt\u2019s referenced in your code at `"+r+"` in `C:\\Users\\\uAC15\uB2E4\uD61C\\Desktop\\code\\psst54-blog-ts\\files\\post\\_mdx_bundler_entry_point-7227d375-440a-4c94-909c-2b637c46833a.mdx`":""))}return w(b);})();
